official-title.#text: To amend the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to clarify the rules regarding the determination of the compensation of the Chief Financial Officer of the District of Columbia.

committee-name.#text: Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

header.#text: Clarification of determination of compensation of Chief Financial Officer of District of Columbia

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: (sec. 1–204.24(b)(2)(E), D.C. Official Code) is amended to read as follows:
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 424(b)(2)(E) of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: District of Columbia Home Rule Act/s:424/ss:b/p:2/sp:E

text.#text: The Chief Financial Officer shall be paid at a rate such that the total amount of compensation paid during any calendar year does not exceed an amount equal to the limit on total pay which is applicable during the year under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall apply with respect to pay periods beginning on or after the date of the enactment of this Act.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 3343 IH: To amend the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to clarify the rules regarding the determination of the compensation of the Chief Financial Officer of the District of Columbia.
